707200f-a.title: Brooklyn: Vermont St. - Glenmore Ave.
707200f-a.text:
Vermont Street (right), at the S. E. corner of Glenmore Avenue.
September 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr
707200f-a.folder: Vermont St. & Glenmore Ave., Brooklyn, NY

707201f-a.title: Brooklyn: Vermont St. - Glenmore Ave.
707201f-a.text:
Vermont Street, west side, north from Glenmore Avenue. Note the steeple of St. Johannes Church, on New Jersey Avenue.
September 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr
707201f-a.folder: Vermont St. & Glenmore Ave., Brooklyn, NY

704628f-a.title: Brooklyn: Glenmore Avenue - Vermont Street
704628f-a.text:
Glenmore Avenue, east from and across Vermont Street, showing the buildings on the north side of the thoroughfare.
September 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr
704628f-a.folder: Glenmore Avenue & Vermont Street, Brooklyn, NY
